body_html:
That could work. I am no MSVC guru so I didn't know how to generate the .def file from many projects/libs as CMake did internally.

The cleanest solution IMO is to define exports manually and enforce that for linux & mac. I understand that this is time consuming, but will free us from having this type of problems later, plus we know what's exported and keep the rest as 'private'

That could work. I am no MSVC guru so I didn't know how to generate the .def file from many projects/libs as CMake did internally.

The cleanest solution IMO is to define exports manually and enforce that for linux & mac. I understand that this is time consuming, but will free us from having this type of problems later, plus we know what's exported and keep the rest as 'private'
